question: Is it permissible to use shoes made out of the leather of those animals which have not been slaughtered according to the Islamic Shari'at?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
It is permissible to use shoes made out of leader of any animal besides a pig which are not slaughtered according to Islamic rights. and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best Mufti Ebrahim Desai FATWA DEPT.
